thread.title: English club Blackpool donate kits to Ghanaian youngsters in collaboration with NGO
thread.title_full: English club Blackpool donate kits to Ghanaian youngsters in collaboration with NGO

title: English club Blackpool donate kits to Ghanaian youngsters in collaboration with NGO
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 10:40 CET English club Blackpool donate kits to Ghanaian youngsters in collaboration with NGO - www.ghanasoccernet.com Blackpool donate kits to Ghanaian youngsters 
Blackpool Football Club has teamed up with Onechild Ghana to donate kits to youngsters in the West African country. 
A number of tangerine shirts from previous seasons have been shipped to the Ashanti region of Ghana for students to play football in. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
